timeline.bodyText: Do you think just a TODO Comment with the issue link should help better rather than removing. It would be a better diff for review.
timeline.author: samvaity

replies.bodyText: Either way works. But it is more clean to delete them right now and create an issue to remain the changes.
replies.author: mssfang

timeline.bodyText: I would keep the original testing scenarios commented too.
timeline.author: samvaity
